mapper.sql: id as "id", table_id as "tableId", db_field_name as "dbFieldName", db_field_desc as "dbFieldDesc", db_field_type as "dbFieldType", db_field_length as "dbFieldLength", db_field_decimal as "dbFieldDecimal", primary_key as "primaryKey", nullable as "nulable", entity_field_name as "entityFieldName", entity_field_type as "entityFieldType", enable_query as "enableQuery", enable_list as "enableList", enable_form as "enableForm", enable_sort as "enableSort", query_type as "queryType", form_type as "formType", form_required as "formRequired", form_validator as "formValidator", form_dict_code as "formDictCode", sort as "sort", single_line as "singleLine"
